name: Sonoran Sunrise

ingredients.name: Orange curaçao (such as Pierre Ferrand dry curaçao)
Yuzu juice blend (1:1 yuzu and fresh lemon juice)
Prickly pear syrup (1:1 Perfect Purée prickly pear purée and sugar)

preparation:
Sure, you could settle for a standard Tequila Sunrise. But wouldn’t you rather enjoy a cocktail with orange curaçao, prickly pear syrup and yuzu juice?

This recipe originally appeared as part of “8 Cocktails to Drink on Cinco de Mayo Instead of a Margarita.”

Muddle the jalapeño slice in a shaker, add the remaining ingredients and ice, and shake.

Double-strain into a rocks glass over ice.

Garnish with a dehydrated orange wheel.
